snippet.title: Swift 4: Intro Auto Layout Landscape with Multipliers (Ep 2)
snippet.description:
Getting your app to work for both orientations of Portrait and Landscape can be difficult. I'll show you some nice tricks that allow you to use a single anchor layout configuration to setup your UI. 
 Multipliers are going to help you out a lot in your designs.  Enjoy.

Episode 1: https://youtu.be/9RydRg0ZKaI
